channel.title: Vitamin A on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Vitamin A on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: In vitro inhibition of mumps by retinoids
item.description: Vitamin A inhibits the replication of mumps virus in vitro. Klenner used vitamin C to treat mumps and its complications.
